title: Remote execution utilities e.g. PSExec
query: (process_name:psexec.exe OR process_name:rexec.exe OR process_name:rcmd.exe or process_name:xcmd.exe)

title: Vulnerable software that spawned a shell
Processes that have VT score > 10, and more than 1 network connection
Command prompt started by commonly compromised programs (browsers, Acrobat, Java, etc.)
query: childproc_name:cmd.exe AND (parent_name:iexplore.exe OR parent_name:firefox.exe OR parent_name:chrome.exe OR parent_name:acrord32.exe OR parent_name:java.exe OR parent_name:javaw.exe OR parent_name:*flash*)

title: Any process that spawned a shell
Adding local users
query: cmdline:net AND (cmdline:user OR cmdline:localgroup) AND cmdline:/add

title: Unsigned binaries creating threads in other processes
Microsoft signed binaries run from unusual paths
filemod:\(null\)_Post AND filemod:Logs/* AND filemod:cr-silent/* AND modload:open
query: filemod:\(null\)_Post AND filemod:Logs/* AND filemod:cr-silent/* AND modload:open

title: Unsigned files written to Outlook content folder
Executable files written to Outlook content folder
Modification of executables for accessibility options or sticky keys
Web ports used by non-browsers
query: ipport:80 AND ipport:443 AND ipport:8080 AND -process_name:chrome.exe AND -process_name:iexplore.exe

title: Internet Explorer compromise
query: modload:vgx.dll AND process_name:iexplore.exe AND modload:*.ocx AND childproc_name:*.dll

title: Not signed binaries initiating connections to public IPs
Unsigned binaries initiating connections to public IPs
Process spawned via Services.exe with >1 network connection
Wininit started by something other than smss.exe
Unsigned binaries started by taskeng.exe that have network communications with public IP space
query: parent_name:taskeng.exe AND netconn_count:[1 TO *] AND -digsig_result:signed AND (ipaddr:[0.0.0.0 to 9.255.255.255] OR ipaddr:[11.0.0.0 to 100.63.255.255] OR ipaddr:[100.128.0.0 to 127.0.0.0] OR ipaddr:[127.0.0.2 to 127.255.255.255] OR ipaddr:[128.0.0.0 to 172.15.255.255] OR ipaddr:[172.32.0.0 to 191.255.255.255] OR ipaddr:[193.0.0.0 to 192.167.255.255] OR ipaddr:[192.169.0.0 to 198.17.255.255] OR ipaddr:[198.20.0.0 to 255.255.255.255])  AND os_type:windows -alliance_score_deloitteexceptions:[1 TO *]

title: Process spawned via Word, Excel, PowerPoint, or Acrobat Reader
query: parent_name:winword.exe OR parent_name:excel.exe OR parent_name:powerpnt.exe OR parent_name:AcroRd32.exe

title: Unsigned binaries executed from drives other than C or D
Suspicious filename (extension hiding)
query: process_name:*.txt.exe OR process_name:*.pdf.exe OR process_name:*.rtf.exe OR process_name:*.jpg.exe OR process_name:*.xml.exe OR process_name:*.gif.exe OR process_name:*.htm.exe OR process_name:*.html.exe OR process_name:*.zip.exe

title: Typical troubleshooting / enumeration tools
query: process_name:enum.exe OR process_name:sc.exe OR process_name:netsh.exe OR process_name:arp.exe OR process_name:nmap.exe OR process_name:tasklist.exe OR process_name:tracert.exe OR process_name:ping.exe OR process_name:netstat.exe

title: Regedit spawned by process other than explorer
Suspicious filename (misspelled system files)
query: process_name:isass.exe OR process_name:svch0st.exe OR process_name:svchost.dll OR process_name:lexplore.exe OR process_name:lexplorer.exe OR process_name:svchosts.exe OR process_name:csrsr.exe

title: RDP sessions to external IP space
Net.exe started by process other than gpshell.exe
Powershell started by process other than explorer or gpscript
Smss started by suspicious process
query: process_name:smss.exe AND parent_name:* AND -parent_name:smss.exe AND -parent_name:ntkrnlpa.exe AND -parent_name:ntoskrnl.exe

title: Registry modification to Hidden entry by process other than explorer
